I'm not sure what invincible ruling you are referring to but i imagine the text is different. The rule forum explained this perfectly on why they dont work together. [url]http://www.hcrealms.com/forum/showthread.php?t=836236[/url]
December 17, 2021
BLsquared
There's a period between the two clauses of the Incandescence ring's power, one for granting EE, and the second gives pen damage when using EE. Going by the ruling for Invincible, giving this Torch that ring would make any EE he uses pen damage. For extra damage, give him Lightning as well for +1 damage dealt for using both bolts. Devastating!

November 12, 2021
Goop
I dont believe thats legal. If you gain the same power through two difference sources with different special abilities you can't combine them. Its one or the other.
November 12, 2021
newkidontheblock
If I played this Torcho, I would most definitely play with the mandarin ring "Incandescence" this would allow Torcho EE to be penetrating. Imagine using EE on two separate groups, 3 damage, penetrating. Deadly for the low price of 55 pts.
